info.author: Chuck Bassett
info.description:
# Rolodex

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/chuckSMASH/rolodex.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/chuckSMASH/rolodex) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/chuckSMASH/rolodex/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/chuckSMASH/rolodex?branch=master)

## Introduction

Rolodex is a utility that parses CSV-like files containing
inconsistently formatted contact details, normalizes them and outputs
them to a JSON file.

## Usage

The package adds a `rolodex` script to your path at installation:

``` bash
$ # write results to result.out:
$ rolodex input_file.in

$ # alternatively, specify a different output file:
$ rolodex --ouput other_name.json input_file.in
$ rolodex -o other_name.json input_file.in
```

## Dependencies

There are no dependencies save for Python. Supported versions:

- Python 2.7

## Installation

Install using pip:

```bash
$ pip install rolodex
```

From source:

```bash
$ git clone git@github.com:chucksmash/rolodex.git
$ cd rolodex
$ pip install -e .
```
